DOC.brief_summary: The 4 follow score propose detect OSA ( Obstructive Sleep Apnea ) : DES-OSA , STOP-Bang , P-SAP , OSA50 . The aim study evaluate optimal cutoff value four score detect specifically serve OSA patient hypoxemia .
